title: If you could come back from death as a ghost, who would you frighten first? - Quora

response.answer_text: The term ‘ghost’ is rather silly. What we are talking about here - is the deceased person’s energy - which can never be destroyed. (That is a basic principle of physics). Now to your question - ‘who would you frighten first’? Why would you want to frighten anyone? You must be very very young to ask such a brainless question.
I would frighten all the directors and script writers of horror bollywood movies…so they improve their work . As I totally believe in serving the society even after becoming ghost . ;)
